Text.Page: An attempt to repair Intrepid's engine failed, but the mission goes on.

I found one piece of Intrepid's engine assembly. I'm not sure, but we might be able to repair it.

Will you help me find the pieces?

Oh, and watch out! There are a lot of angry birds around here.

Now, let's find the engine. From the scatter pattern, it must be farther up this hill.

You'll need to fight through the Parthians up there, but I'm not scared. You'll be fine!

I'm not an engineer, but it looks salvageable.

What do you say?"Unfortunately not."

Then let us leave this foul encampment.

Beyond those bloodclaw wolves, Rhodos waits for us. I will see you there. Stay safe!

Glad to see you again.

How is that huge thing you used to come here?"Damaged beyond repair."
A pity. Such a device might have given us an edge in battle.
